text: Samukh () is a raion of Azerbaijan. The term Samukh is from a Caucasian Albanian word for 'Forest Hunting Place'.Azerbaijan Guidebook (Fourth Edition), AzerOlympicInternational Publishing House (2007) p.262 There are Bronze Age burial mounds around Nəbiağalı, the raion's administrative center. ==References== Category:Districts of Azerbaijan Category:Ganja-Gazakh Economic Region
title: Samukh District
